name: unilateralism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process or fact of deciding a policy or action without involving another group or country: He has made the world more dangerous by his arrogant unilateralism. Our position in the world has been weakened by too much unilateralism and too little cooperation. See
unilateral
a policy of getting rid of your country's nuclear weapons without first waiting for other countries to do the same: the party's switch from unilateralism to a policy of nuclear deterrence
More examplesFewer examplesHe is distancing himself from the perceived unilateralism of the current administration.He was seen as a man who would end an era of American unilateralism.The pressure for isolationism and unilateralism is growing in both political parties.
